reg_info.act_under: Insurance Act   Loi sur les assurances

content.content: 1. (1) In this Regulation, “guideline” means the minimum capital test guideline made by the Chief Executive Officer, as amended from time to time.  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 1; O. Reg. 130/19, s. 1 (1).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) In this Regulation,

“guideline” means the minimum capital test guideline made by the Chief Executive Officer, as amended from time to time.  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 1; O. Reg. 130/19, s. 1 (1).

content.content: 2. For the purposes of subsection 102 (8) of the Act, every insurer shall for every fiscal year, commencing with the fourth quarter of the 2004 fiscal year, maintain capital in compliance with the requirements set out in the guideline.  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. For the purposes of subsection 102 (8) of the Act, every insurer shall for every fiscal year, commencing with the fourth quarter of the 2004 fiscal year, maintain capital in compliance with the requirements set out in the guideline.  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 2.

content.content: 4. This Regulation does not apply to an insurer that comes within a class set out in paragraph 4, 7 or 8 of subsection 42 (1) of the Act.  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. This Regulation does not apply to an insurer that comes within a class set out in paragraph 4, 7 or 8 of subsection 42 (1) of the Act.  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 5.

content.content: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 6.
content.raw_html: 6. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 259/04, s. 6.
